EmailTemplate.subject: Your Imc CAM Connection - November Newsletter
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
November 2011 Edition (http://offers.tritech.com/Imc_CC_Nov11_ImcCAMConnection_Main.html) Welcome to the November issue of the Imc Solutions' CAM Connection newsletter. The main page of will give you an overall glance at what this month's newsletter has to offer. We hope you enjoy the newsletter.
Important Alerts & Updates (http://offers.tritech.com/Imc_CC_Nov11_ImcCAMConnection_AlertUpdates.html)
> Prepare for New Massachusetts EMD Mandate
> Hot Fix for New Hampshire Court Complaint Form Change and Maine OUI Intoxication Form Changes
> Responding to Your Input – Technician Software Knowledge In-Service Thursdays
> Current Version Page Now Linked to Client Issues Reports
Products & Services (http://offers.tritech.com/Imc_CC_Nov11_ImcCAMConnection_ProductsServices.html)
> Imc Solutions Fire RMS DEMO [VIDEO]
> Best Practices for Building Comprehensive Records [DEMO]
> Imc Solutions Crime Analysis [DEMO]
> Fix It with Felicia – Next session Thursday, November 10th
Technical Support Hot Topics (http://offers.tritech.com/Imc_CC_Nov11_ImcCAMConnection_TechnicalSupportHotTopics.html) > Submit Your Product Enhancement Requests On-Line
> Technical Q&As ﻿
Client News & GoLives (http://offers.tritech.com/Imc_CC_Nov11_ImcCAMConnection_ClientNews.html)
> New Installs for September and October
> Commissioners Sign Contracts for New Dispatch, Records System
